header.title: Our Partners
header.description: Genetica® is recognized as the leading player in the personal genomics industry by our partners across the globe.

body.description:
Genetica's laboratories in San Francisco and Vietnam meet CLIA standards - the strictest U.S. standards for the accuracy of laboratories.

By analyzing hundreds of genes, our genetic reports provide precise scientific information about physical, behavioral, intellectual traits & health risks, with personalized recommendations for each user.

1.title: Register Service
1.description: After purchase, Genetica will send the DNA collection kit to your registered address.

2.title: Collect your saliva sample
2.description: Simply follow the instruction found inside the DNA tesing kit to collect your saliva. Once ready, send your saliva back to us for DNA analysis.

3.title: Results ready in 30 working days
3.description: Download Genetica mobile app to view your comprehensive results with personalized recommendations.
